answer.description: The opposite of fine. This just means that the discussion is over.

answer.response: This is a test of your judgment
answer.description: I'm not going to tell you if I think it's okay or not to do this thing. You should know enough about me by now to know if I'm okay with it. Which I'm not, by the way. If you do this, we are through.

question: I need space
I think we need a break

answer.description: We're probably about to break up.
I mean a break from the relationship forever.

answer.response: I'm interested, but I don't want to waste any more energy on you if you've already got someone in your life
answer.description: I'm interested, but I don't want to waste any more energy on you if you've already got someone in your life. If you do, be honest right now. If you don't, ask me for my goddamn number already.

answer.response: I'll be ready when I'm ready
answer.description: Could be 10 minutes, could be an hour. Find something else to do.
If you don't you're going to be single very soon.

answer.response: I need to talk. You need to listen.
I'm so furious with you that I can't think straight
answer.description: I need more time to gather ammunition and/or think about what the fuck I'm still doing with you.
Thank you for the gift. It's the thought that counts. But I'm going to exchange this for something I actually like.
Did you seriously ask me, “What's wrong?” As if you don't know. Everything is wrong. Everything. Be afraid. Be very afraid.
You did something, and I am furious.
You have won this round, but I refuse to concede, so I'm dismissing that last point you made, and we shall never speak of this again.
I have no more words for you. It’s just not worth it.

answer.response: I can live with what you've done. But...
answer.description: I've decided I can live with what you've done. But you should know that I'm going to use it against you for the rest of your life.

question: Does this make me look fat

answer.response: Please tell me I'm not fat
answer.description: If you answer “Yes,” you're idiot. Just tell me I look great.
You order whatever you want, just know that I'm going to be picking off your plate, and I don't want you to give me any shit about it.

answer.response: You relaxed a little in the relationship
answer.description: I think you’re taking me for granted and/or you’re starting to let yourself go a little, so I’m lighting a little fire under your ass.

question: Sense of humor is the most important thing to me

answer.response: But I’ll settle for that guy with the six-pack and giant dong
You are just one of my options
answer.description: I’ve got at least one other guy on a string right now, and I haven’t decided yet which one of you a like more.

answer.response: I am sorry but I am admitting fault in any way
answer.description: I am empathizing with you for something shitty that you went through. This does not mean I am admitting fault in any way.

answer.response: I don't want you around me
answer.description: I don’t want you anywhere near me tonight. I’ll be going to bed soon. After that, feel free to go to town on yourself. Just leave me out of it.
I just gave you a get-out-of-jail-free card. It’s up to you to rephrase that stupid thing you just said to avoid a huge fight.
I heard you clearly but you might want to rephrase your statement’.
I don’t want to date you. Please stop calling me.
She really means she is mad at you.
Tell me I’m pretty. And you get bonus points if you don’t even look at her before you answer.
I want to have babies, but I don’t want to scare you off. However, based on your answer, I will know your level of commitment.

answer.response: I can’t count on you for anything
answer.description: I’ve asked you five times to fix the f*** thing and you still haven’t done it? I can’t count on you for anything.
They are honestly saying no.
They really mean No.
Yes. Or maybe. But probably no.
Yes, or no or maybe. You have to read the body language and situation.

answer.response: This one’s not open to interpretation
answer.description: This one’s not open to interpretation. Always, always, always assume that when you hear this word, she means what she’s saying, even if she doesn’t. If you get it wrong, that’s on her, not you.

answer.response: You should probably rethink what you just said
Try me. I dare you to

answer.description: Not okay. I'm mad at you.

answer.response: I'm simply amazed that you could be so stupid or inconsiderate

question: Are you really going to wear that

answer.description: You are not wearing that. Go and change. Period.

question: Do you remember what day it is today

answer.description: Today is my birthday/our anniversary and you forgot
No it’s not. You had better not make that decision on your own.. You had better not make that decision on your own.

question: No, you should go without me

answer.response: Don't even try to go without me
answer.description: Absolutely not. Don’t step out of this house.

question: So where do you see this relationship going

answer.description: I want to take this relationship to the next level. I want a commitment

answer.response: I really don't like your friends

question: You don’t need to get me anything

answer.description: You don’t NEED to, but you probably should, and it had better heartfelt.

question: So why did you and your ex-girlfriend break up

answer.response: I’m trying to figure out if you’re a cheater or if there’s any other thing wrong with you

answer.description: I meant you will be a friend that they’ll never talk to again. So not a friend at all.
It’s definitely you. You are the problem.

question: I’m not looking to date anyone right now

answer.response: I wont looking to date YOU
I just don’t have time for you
I don't give a f*** about you now
I don't care about you now

answer.description: It doesn’t really mean thank you, you probably didn’t do something right so she is mad at you.
